author: i3dangels
title: i3D Mass Adoption Protocol
description: 初创企业投资的大规模采用是一个不流动、高风险、数据差的环境，对创始人和投资者来说，流动性很低。

f6_assessments.q0: 以初创企业这样的用户群为目标，可以为Cardano社区带来很大的好处。该提案的重点是为初创企业提供所需的资金和财政援助。去中心化的功能为团队所设想的这个平台提供了更多的可扩展性和完整性。该提案的成功实施可以吸引更多计划在去中心化网络上托管的初创公司的注意，使他们更喜欢Cardano链而不是其他链。说到这里，我强烈感觉到这对社区的影响可能是巨大的。
f6_assessments.q1: 提案人向读者提供了他们游戏计划的详细说明。分阶段的发展和相应的最后期限为社会提供了可预见的结果。提到通过下一轮的进一步资金需求，为提案的真实性增加了可信度。团队的融合和他们的经验是一种补充。已经打下的大量基础工作是另一个值得关注的积极因素。该团队还认识到其可能面临的威胁和弱点，以及他们计划如何通过SWOT分析来减轻这些威胁和弱点，这与其他许多提案相比，无疑是独特的。然而，要想在可行性标准上获得满分，一份详尽的预算明细表就能起到作用。
f6_assessments.q2: 创建一个新的代币来促进操作，肯定表明这个建议正在朝着它设想的目的地前进。然而，提案人没有明确指出审计人员可以用什么指标来定期监测进展情况。我认为提案人可以加入足够好的指标，如入驻的初创企业数量、资金数额、平台促成的新贡献等，并为每项指标提供估计数字。时间表和交付成果看起来很有希望，因此，我给提案的清晰度和可审计性打4分（满分5分）。

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal has been presented by a strong team, after detailed planning and SWOT analysis. With this background work and detailed planning, there is a very high chance that the project will be implemented in the best possible manner. The Github repos are also very active with substantial work showcasing the team's capability and commitment.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal has been presented by a strong team, after detailed planning and SWOT analysis. With this background work and detailed planning, there is a very high chance that the project will be implemented in the best possible manner. The Github repos are also very active with substantial work showcasing the team's capability and commitment.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal includes a whole meaningful KPI that can measure the actual adoption rate. The funding is for the development round, enabling scaling and allowing rapid mass consensus by a more extensive network to assess the idea. There are a nicely laid out roadmap and plan. Therefore the I think the proposal is auditable.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal speaks directly to the main objectives of the challenge, by implementing 3 Token Double Sided Marketplace offering a combination of due diligence, network validation, investor capital preservation and liquidity to encourage mass adoption for crypto startup investing. The project offers complete end to end solution that solve three common problems for crypto startup which are credibility, network validity, and capital. This project is certainly a game changer in DeFi and could potentially foster lots of new crypto startups.
f6_assessments.q1: Team consist of multiple individuals with significantly relevant credential and expertise. Given the combined experience presented by its team member, it is highly likely that the project can be a huge success. Team provides clear roadmap and requests a reasonable budget with detailed breakdown. The whitepaper provided by the team has depth technical explanation. Problem statement and solution delivered match and both address the challenge effectively. Success measure of this project is very reasonable, and team has explained clearly their step-by-step execution plan. This proposal is one of the best in Fund 7 and should be voted by the community.
f6_assessments.q2: The success criteria provided the proposal is reasonable and achievable that make the project feasible and realistic. Team does not mention where they will publish the progress of project execution making their web as the only source of monitor or audit the project. So, the team can improve the execution of this project by posting the detailed budget spending on cardano forum so it can be audited by the community member. This proposal is one of the best in Fund 7 and should be voted by the community.

f6_assessments.q0:
Startups lack a lot of resources and have to do tons of inexperienced work in a limited time. For good startups that want to save time and get rid of problems in due diligence, this idea is a silver bullet for them. Moreover, this idea also inspires a lot of investors to come and help young startups because its mechanic and features can help startups transparent info easier. 
In addition, throughout the proposal, there is a lot of solution that is not just for solving the problem, but also motivate users a lot to engage with this platform. 
I think that the success of this platform will affect a lot to the world and Cardano ecosystem, especially it can help startups in Catalyst problems go further easier.
f6_assessments.q1:
This team can make it! 
This is an experienced team in startups and TradFi, DeFi... that's not just from their profile but checking the detailed info of their plan, they have a good guiding about how their solution can point out the necessary features/ activities that really need for the user based on user insight - as my experience with the position of startup and stakeholder. 
But I hope the team can have a better roadmap, more detail to help me understand what they are doing and gonna do in that time. 
Last but not least, it's appreciated when they add their SWOT into the proposal. It means they have well analytics and can has a good plan to implement this idea.
f6_assessments.q2:
The roadmap is less info for auditing what the team will do. But their KPIs are very promising, all about the number of user adoption. 
I hope that this team will succeed in this idea, this will help a lot of startups around the world. And will increase the number of startups that can fly to the moon.

solution: 3个代币双面市场提供尽职调查、网络验证、投资者资本保值和流动性的组合
experience: 受过教育和有经验的团队，集体有多次创业经验。我们是强大而平衡的，在贸易和国防领域有丰富的经验。
